text: Ni We wabaremye abakomoye ku muntu umwe (Adamu), nuko amuremera umugore we [Hawa (Eva)] amumukomoyemo kugira ngo amuboneho ituze. Iyo umwe (mu rubyaro rwa Adamu) abonanye n’umugore we, asama inda abasha kugendana bimworoheye. Iyo amaze gukurirwa, basaba Allah Nyagasani wabo bagira bati “Nuramuka uduhaye umwana utunganye, rwose tuzaba mu bashimira.”
